title: My dog 'Number'
creator_credit: Paul Barralet and British Information Services
brief_description: A typical year in the life of David Murray, a Scottish sheep farmer, and of “Number”, his champion sheep-dog; filmed against pleasant Scottish hill-country, with interesting wildlife sequences, through the four seasons.
description: A typical year in the life of David Murray, a Scottish sheep farmer, and of “Number”, his champion sheep-dog; filmed against pleasant Scottish hill-country, with interesting wildlife sequences, through the four seasons.
